title: How Nextdoor became a political battleground
description:
The social network tried to keep conversations focused on local issues. But as Recode’s Rebecca Heilweil explains, national politics took over.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: How Nextdoor became a political battleground
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: From mask mandates to political lawn signs, politics have come to Nextdoor. Not everyone is happy about it.
